DataElement.preferredName: Methotrexate Agent Current Report Period Adminstered End Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date administration of methotrexate ended during the current report period.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Methotrexate Agent Current Report Period Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the administration of methotrexate, an antimetabolite with antineoplastic and immunomodulating properties, during the current report period.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An antimetabolite with antineoplastic and immunomodulating properties.  Methotrxate inhibits the enzyme dihydrofolate reductase, resulting in inhibition of purine nucleotide and thymidylate synthesis and, subsequently, inhibition of DNA and RNA syntheses.  Methotrexate also exhibits potent immunosuppressant properties. (NCI04):An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An antimetabolite and antifolate agent with antineoplastic and immunosuppressant activities. Methotrexate binds to and inhibits the enzyme dihydrofolate reductase, resulting in inhibition of purine nucleotide and thymidylate synthesis and, subsequently, inhibition of DNA and RNA syntheses. Methotrexate also exhibits potent immunosuppressant activity although the mechanism(s) of actions is unclear.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Report; a short account.:An interval of time. (NCI):Given.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event ended.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
